<S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G935>kings<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> committed sexual <S%G4203>immorality,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> those who <S%G2730>dwell<s%> in the <S%G1093>earth<s%> were made <S%G3184>drunken<s%> <S%G1537>with<s%> the <S%G3631>wine<s%> of <S%G846>her<s%> sexual <S%G4202>immorality.<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> He <S%G667>carried<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> away <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G2048>wilderness.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> a <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G2521>sitting<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> a <S%G2847>scarlet-colored<s%> <S%G2342>animal,<s%> <S%G1073>full<s%> of <S%G988>blasphemous<s%> <S%G3686>names,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2776>heads<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G2768>horns.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The <S%G1135>woman<s%> was <S%G4016>dressed<s%> in <S%G4209>purple<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2847>scarlet,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5558>decked<s%> with <S%G5557>gold<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5093>precious<s%> <S%G3037>stones<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3135>pearls,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%> a <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G4221>cup<s%> <S%G1073>full<s%> of <S%G946>abominations<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G168>impurities<s%> of the sexual <S%G4202>immorality<s%> of the <S%G846>earth.<s%>

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G3359>forehead<s%> a <S%G3686>name<s%> was <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G3466>"MYSTERY,<s%> <S%G897>BABYLON<s%> THE <S%G3173>GREAT,<s%> THE <S%G3384>MOTHER<s%> OF THE <S%G4204>PROSTITUTES<s%> <S%G2532>AND<s%> OF THE <S%G946>ABOMINATIONS<s%> OF THE <S%G1093>EARTH.<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G3184>drunken<s%> <S%G1537>with<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of the <S%G40>saints,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1537>with<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of the <S%G3144>martyrs<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> When I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G846>her,<s%> I <S%G2296>wondered<s%> with <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2295>amazement.<s%>

The <S%G2342>beast<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> you <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G2258>was,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> about to <S%G305>come<s%> up out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G12>abyss<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G5217>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G684>destruction.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> Those who <S%G2730>dwell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> and <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G3686>names<s%> have <S%G3756>not<s%> been <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> the <S%G975>book<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G2602>foundation<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%> will <S%G2296>marvel<s%> when they <S%G991>see<s%> that the <S%G2342>beast<s%> <S%G3748>was,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> shall <S%G2539>be<s%> <S%G2076>present.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> They <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G935>kings.<s%> <S%G4002>Five<s%> have <S%G4098>fallen,<s%> <S%G2532>the<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2076>is,<s%> the <S%G243>other<s%> has not <S%G3768>yet<s%> <S%G2064>come.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3752>When<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2064>comes,<s%> he <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G3306>continue<s%> a little <S%G3641>while.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G2768>horns<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> you <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G935>kings<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> have <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G3768>no<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> as <S%G3768>yet,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> they <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G935>kings,<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the <S%G2342>beast,<s%> for <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G5610>hour.<s%>

<S%G3778>These<s%> will <S%G4170>war<s%> <S%G3326>against<s%> the <S%G721>Lamb,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G721>Lamb<s%> will <S%G3528>overcome<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> he <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of <S%G2962>lords,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G935>King<s%> of <S%G935>kings.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> They also will overcome who <S%G3588>are<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2822>called<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1588>chosen<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4103>faithful.<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> The <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G2768>horns<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G1492>saw,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2342>beast,<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> will <S%G3404>hate<s%> the <S%G4204>prostitute,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> will <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G2049>desolate,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> will make her <S%G1131>naked,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> will <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> will <S%G2618>burn<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> utterly <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G4442>fire.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G1325>put<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> what <S%G846>he<s%> has in <S%G1106>mind,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to be of <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1106>mind,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> to the <S%G2342>beast,<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> the <S%G4487>words<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> should be <S%G5055>accomplished.<s%>
